condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 3.1 An additional 2.1 M people in urban and rural areas have sustained access to improved safe water supply by 2015

description.narrative: Through UNICEF's direct support. Since 2011 to date, 2,760,000 (23% of the 12 Million) people in Somalia have access to basic drinking at both community and institutional levels, of whom 7% of the population were provided access in 2017. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/07/2017

title.narrative: Proportion of people accessing basic drinking water during the reporting year only, as a result of UNICEF direct support.
# of additional health facilities/ nutrition centers at which WASH facilities have been installed

actual.value: 2016:107 (60 Schools and 47 Health/ Nutrition Facilities in 2016)
